name: BrandCrowd
description: BrandCrowd is an online platform offering customizable logo designs and branding tools for businesses and entrepreneurs.
longDescription: BrandCrowd is an online creative marketplace that enables startups, businesses, and entrepreneurs to create professional logos and branding materials quickly and affordably. Founded as part of DesignCrowd, it provides access to a vast library of over 234,000 handcrafted logo designs created by professional designers worldwide. The platformâ€™s logo maker allows users to customize templates with ease, catering to various industries like fashion, tech, and more. Its mission is to simplify branding for users with limited design experience by offering intuitive tools and instant downloads. Beyond logos, BrandCrowd supports the creation of business cards, social media posts, and other marketing materials, making it a comprehensive branding solution. It also offers premium logo packs and exclusive designs to ensure unique brand identities.
features: The logo maker allows users to customize over 234,000 handcrafted logo templates to create unique brand identities in minutes.
Users can generate AI-powered business names tailored to their industry, enhancing brand creation efficiency.
The platform provides high-resolution (PNG, JPG) and vector (SVG, EPS, PDF) logo files for web and print use.
BrandCrowd offers tools to create matching business cards, letterheads, and social media banners for cohesive branding.
A drag-and-drop editor enables easy customization of fonts, colors, and layouts without design expertise.
Users can preview logos on various platforms and products, ensuring versatility across branding needs.
The platform includes a favorites shortlist feature to save and compare logo designs before finalizing.
Exclusive logo purchase options ensure designs are removed from the marketplace for unique branding.
BrandCrowd provides a worldwide, irrevocable license for commercial and non-commercial logo use.
The platform supports 24/7 customer support from logo experts for assistance throughout the design process.

faqs.question: Is BrandCrowd free to use?
faqs.answer: BrandCrowd offers a free plan to browse and customize logos, but downloading most designs requires a paid plan starting at $9/month.

faqs.question: Can I edit my logo after downloading it?
faqs.answer: Yes, BrandCrowd allows unlimited edits to your logo designs, even after downloading, through your account.

faqs.question: What file formats are included with a logo purchase?
faqs.answer: Purchased logos include high-resolution PNG and JPG files, vector SVG, EPS, and PDF files, and transparent versions.

faqs.question: Does BrandCrowd offer exclusive logos?
faqs.answer: Yes, BrandCrowd offers exclusive logo options that are removed from the marketplace after purchase for unique branding.

faqs.question: Can I create other branding materials besides logos?
faqs.answer: BrandCrowd provides templates for business cards, social media posts, letterheads, and more to support comprehensive branding.

faqs.question: How does the AI business name generator work?
faqs.answer: The AI generator creates catchy business names based on user-provided keywords, tailored to their industry and brand vision.

faqs.question: Is customer support available for design issues?
faqs.answer: BrandCrowd offers 24/7 support from logo experts to assist with design and technical queries.

faqs.question: Can I use my logo for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: Yes, BrandCrowd provides a worldwide, irrevocable license for both commercial and non-commercial logo use.

faqs.question: How do I cancel my BrandCrowd subscription?
faqs.answer: Subscriptions can be canceled anytime via the account settings or by emailing support@brandcrowd.com.
